messages.content: SELECT * FROM Professor WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT professor_id, last_name FROM Professor WHERE first_name = 'John' INDEX(first_name); -ShawGPT
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE course_code = 'MATH101';
SELECT course_id, course_name, credit_hours FROM Course WHERE course_code = 'MATH101' INDEX(course_code); -ShawGPT
SELECT * FROM Enrollment WHERE student_id IN (10, 20, 30);
SELECT course_id FROM Enrollment WHERE student_id IN (10, 20, 30) INDEX(student_id); -ShawGPT
SELECT * FROM Classroom WHERE building_name = 'Main Building';
SELECT classroom_id, room_number, capacity FROM Classroom WHERE building_name = 'Main Building' INDEX(building_name); -ShawGPT
SELECT * FROM Exam WHERE course_id = 1 AND exam_date > '2024-02-08';
SELECT exam_id, exam_date, exam_duration FROM Exam WHERE course_id = 1 AND exam_date > '2024-02-08' INDEX(course_id, exam_date); -ShawGPT
SELECT * FROM Department WHERE department_code = 'CS';
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM Department WHERE department_code = 'CS' INDEX(department_code); -ShawGPT
SELECT * FROM ClassSchedule WHERE start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '09:00:00';
SELECT course_id, classroom_id FROM ClassSchedule WHERE start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '09:00:00' INDEX(start_time); -ShawGPT
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE professor_id = 5 AND department_id = 2;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_code FROM Course WHERE professor_id = 5 AND department_id = 2 INDEX(professor_id, department_id); -ShawGPT
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Student WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Student WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' INDEX(email); -ShawGPT
SELECT * FROM Exam WHERE exam_date BETWEEN '2023-12-01' AND '2023-12-31';

SELECT * FROM Classroom WHERE capacity > 30;
